phrase.original: It is much easier and quicker to open an app by clicking on its icon vs. typing its Web address into your browser. You can get the icon for First Principles on your device through installation.
To install this app, you must add it to your home screen. Just follow the instructions below.

phrase.desc: Chrome on Android, with 'Add to Home Screen' button visible
phrase.original: Scroll to the very bottom of this page.
Click on the "Add to Home Screen" button, and follow the prompts.
Now check your device's home screen for the First Principles app icon.

phrase.desc: Chrome on Android, with 'Add to Home Screen' button NOT visible
phrase.original: Open your browser's menu. It's in the corner of this window and looks like the following three dots:
Click on the menu item that says either "Add to Home Screen" or "Install First Principles," then follow the prompts.
Open your browser's menu by clicking on the following icon at the bottom of this window. It looks like a rectangle containing an upward-pointing arrow:
Scroll through the menu items and click "Add to Home Screen," then follow the prompts.
In your Web browser, click on the button that opens the browser's menu options.
Find and click on the menu item that says something like "Add to Home Screen" or "Install First Principles," then follow the prompts.
